hero.headline: Every ring begins with a choice
hero.subheadline: A meaningful travel memory beyond the usual

aMoment.title: Not a store. A memory you create together.
aMoment.paragraphOne: Two seats, one table, raw silver, open flame.
aMoment.paragraphTwo: You do not buy a ring. You craft it, side by side, together.

items.title: Authenticity
items.text: Every ring should carry meaning. We design each moment so memory and craft stay connected.

items.title: Craftsmanship
items.text: Authenticity first. Sterling silver, natural stones, and real artisanal techniques shape the experience.

items.title: Connection
items.text: Human connection matters. The table is small by design: attention, guidance, and shared focus.

items.title: Meaning
items.text: No mass tourism routine. You leave with something personal, made by hand and owned by your story.

reviews.heading: What people say about the experience
reviews.description: In a world full of hyper-activity, you can decide to slow down

items.author: Elena M.
items.text: Beautiful concept and very personal guidance. We left with rings we actually made together.

items.author: James R.
items.text: Not a tourist trap. Calm, authentic, and memorable from start to finish.

items.author: Mina K.
items.text: The best memory of our Sri Lanka trip. The craft process felt meaningful and real.
